title: minerjones
author: minerjones
created_time: December 03, 2022, 03:00:35 PMLast edit: December 04, 2022, 11:42:33 AM by minerjones
content: 2015 Papersafe Series A #001 (of 100)This is the first regular Papersafe ever released by BG4STARTING BID: 0.0000BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 8th, 2022, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: This auction is being placed on hold for now.Apparently this note was sold and paid for by another forum user and should not be up for auctionWill update more shortly once I get more informationPlease DO NOT place any more bids for nowThank you

comments.author: cygan
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on December 04, 2022, 11:44:29 AMThis auction is being placed on hold for now.Apparently this note was sold and paid for by another forum user and should not be up for auctionWill update more shortly once I get more informationPlease DO NOT place any more bids for nowThank youhmm, how is that possible if you want to sell this paperwallet via an auction but in the background the supposed owner sells it just like that...

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: cygan on December 04, 2022, 11:54:19 AMQuote from: minerjones on December 04, 2022, 11:44:29 AMThis auction is being placed on hold for now.Apparently this note was sold and paid for by another forum user and should not be up for auctionWill update more shortly once I get more informationPlease DO NOT place any more bids for nowThank youhmm, how is that possible if you want to sell this paperwallet via an auction but in the background the supposed owner sells it just like that...  That is what we are trying to figure out.....Apparently it was sold to a forum user here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417817.msg61155180#msg61155180But a different forum user ended up with it and was sent for auction to me.Waiting for answers from parties involved

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on December 04, 2022, 11:57:54 AMQuote from: cygan on December 04, 2022, 11:54:19 AMQuote from: minerjones on December 04, 2022, 11:44:29 AMThis auction is being placed on hold for now.Apparently this note was sold and paid for by another forum user and should not be up for auctionWill update more shortly once I get more informationPlease DO NOT place any more bids for nowThank youhmm, how is that possible if you want to sell this paperwallet via an auction but in the background the supposed owner sells it just like that...  That is what we are trying to figure out.....Apparently it was sold to a forum user here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5417817.msg61155180#msg61155180But a different forum user ended up with it and was sent for auction to me.Waiting for answers from parties involvedUpdate:Original owner has repaid the primary "buyer" and this note is no longer blacklisted.It will currently not be re-auctioned.
